title: My Lady Witch
description: Madison has lived her life yearning for self worth and freedom from her alcoholic father. An unexpected turn of fate sends her to England, where a carcrash frees her of her memories, throws her world into darkness and transports her eight hundred years into the past.She finds herself dependant upon Liam of Norick, a medieval Lord who vows to protect her. In caring for Madison, Liam offers her the life she'd alwaysdreamt of. For the first time Madison finds herself safe in the arms of an honorable man who would risk everything to keep her protected.In the midst of her happiness, she is accused of witchcraft, and the home she's grown to love is threatened by evil in the shape of a wicked man, Malford. He will stop at nothing to take Norick from Liam and claim it for himself.For Madison, love is finally possible. However, when she's accused of witchcraft, she finds herself struggling to save the life she loves before it'sall taken away
author: K.L. Brown
